raylikeray: I LOVE this. Kamala has all the tools to be able to prosper as president. I believe this is actually great timing for her to run. Let me explain: before president Trump was in office there was not a significant turnout at the polls for the younger generation. And as we know, this has somewhat always been the case. But since Trumps election and all of his disarray, people are really listening and taking note of what is going on! Millennials are stepping up by participating in protest, standing up for the truth, and not letting fallacies dictate their decision making. This is not to say we still do not have some work to do, but we must continue to push past the current status quo and fight for the future we want for America, our kids, us and the future generations to come. Kamala is a strong, intelligent, meaningful, substantial candidate. She is not just running for America, but for all of the little girls who look like her. She is saying, “oh little girl, don’t be afraid of the dark. Now it's the dark's turn to be afraid. ” This bestows hope upon people who were deprived from this powerful emotion. The present is ghastly and there are many abhorrent events occurring every day, but significant change (like the past there are many examples: segregation, slavery, women’s rights) can not occur without cognitive dissonance.
